item.title: Got a packet bigger than ‘max_allowed_packet’ bytes
item.description: I got this on a newly installed server when I tried to import a database: [root@host ~]# mysql -u user -pPassword database < database.sql Enter password: ERROR 1153 (08S01) at line 53: Got a packet bigger than 'max_allowed_packet' bytes It’s easily fixable. The default is probably 16M, I added the following in /etc/my.cnf max_allowed_packet=32M And restarted mysql (depending on your distro you will do this differently): service mysqld restart
